display.title: Ancient Armor (Archer)
display.description: Drop a stack of Faded Scrap, Pig Hide & Snow Golem Core onto a Reinforced Deepslate Block, along with an already Timmed piece of Armor to convert it to a new Ancient Trim [Required: 64x Faded Scrap 1x Pig Hide 1x Snow Golem Core 1x Any Trimmed Armor Piece | Drop Craft With: Reinforced Deepslate]
